channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: German law allowing institutional funds to hold crypto comes into effect Aug. 2
item.dc:creator: Sam Bourgi
item.description: As much as $415 billion worth of investments could flow into cryptocurrencies as new laws governing German Spezialfonds go into effect.

item.title: Bitcoin 'supercycle' sets up Q4 BTC price top as illiquid supply hits all-time high
item.dc:creator: William Suberg
item.description: Recent events mean that a Q4 "blow-off top" is now back on the menu as BTC price recovery clings to its 23% weekly gains.

item.title: Pro traders look for this classic pattern to spot Bitcoin price reversals
item.dc:creator: Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: Crypto and stock traders view the inverse head-and-shoulders pattern as an early signal that a bullish trend reversal is in the making.

item.title: NFTs can be a good pathway to draw women into crypto, says Lavinia Osbourne
item.dc:creator: Turner Wright
item.description: Though nonfungible token projects are one path to entry, women are still underrepresented in many crypto and blockchain firms.

item.title: Avalanche launches upgraded bridge, prepping DApps for mainstream adoption
item.dc:creator: Max Moeller
item.description: The new bridge is allegedly five times cheaper, faster, and more secure than before. The company says it is meant to act as a "growth engine" for future expansi...
